description: A 41-year-old man was pronounced dead at the scene, police say.
title: Driver dies after car crashes into wall in Wolverhampton
title_page: Driver dies after car crashes into wall in Wolverhampton - BBC News
maintext:
A man has died after a car struck a wall in Wolverhampton, police said.
Officers were called to the crash on the A449 Penn Road in the city at about 17:22 GMT on Saturday.
The driver of the black Ford Focus, a 41-year-old man, was pronounced dead at the scene, West Midlands Police said.
An investigation has been launched and officers are appealing for anyone with information or dashcam footage of the incident to come forward.
